messages.message: @Jeff have you resolved the slowness? I still experience slowness for the second plus request
Not really…I have been just using grpcurl to do some testing

@mfichman any suggestions? I’ve used ppy localhost on crafting sandbox couple times after nginx port change, but the api request latency is inconsistent. Sometimes it’s fast as usual but today it takes 40s for all requests

I re-started redis and the slowness is gone now! :tada: thanks @Xindi Xu
_(have to manually compile with_ 
```cd ~/instabase/third-party/docker/redis
make build-docker```
)
What’s weird was that my redis was actually up before restarting.
Hey @daniel -- make sure Redis is up
Redis down = sad sad story, much slow, very latency
May want to try this out as well :slightly_smiling_face: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1730156717260229?thread_ts=1730134701.987449&cid=C05L87V014J
